Menu 1

Japan Listeni/dʒəˈpæn/ (Japanese: 日本 Nippon or Nihon; formally 日本国 About this sound Nippon-koku or Nihon-koku, literally "the State of Japan") is an island nation in East Asia. Located in the Pacific Ocean, it lies to the east of the Sea of Japan, China, North Korea, South Korea and Russia, stretching from the Sea of Okhotsk in the north to the East China Sea and Taiwan in the south. The characters that make up Japan's name mean "sun-origin", which is why the country is sometimes referred to as the "Land of the Rising Sun". Japan is an archipelago of 6,852 islands, the four largest being Honshu, Hokkaido, Kyushu and Shikoku. Together, these four islands hold about 97 percent of the country's land area. Japan has the world's tenth-largest population, with more than 126 million people. Honshū's Greater Tokyo Area includes the de facto capital city of Tokyo and several surrounding prefectures. It is the largest metropolitan area in the world, with more than 30 million residents.

Japan Listeni/dʒəˈpæn/ (Japanese: 日本 Nippon or Nihon; formally 日本国 About this sound Nippon-koku or Nihon-koku, literally "the State of Japan") is an island nation in East Asia. Properties

Name Default Description
target @$btn.data('target') Find element with this selector and work with it as a popup window. Changes button's data attributes
toggle @$btn.data('toggle') or 'popup' To automatically initialize this plugin without any javascript initialization. Changes button's data attributes. Just in case.
event click.#{@_name} This event will be used to open popup window; use namespaced events, for example hover.popup or click.popup
eventClose click.#{@_name} This event will be used to close window; use namespaced events, will be bind on elements with data-dismiss="popup" inside this popup window
positionVertical 'top' Popup position relative to the button.
'top' / 'middle' / 'bottom'
positionHorizontal 'center' Popup position relative to the button.
'left' / 'center' / 'right'
offset {horizontal:5, vertical:5} In px. Offset relative to positionVertical and positionHorizontal
closeUnfocus false Close popup if click outside of it.
selfish true Close all popup windows when open this one.

Methods

Inside each method to get button use @ or this in js. Class instance always stores in data attribute of the button element @data('kit-popup') or this.data('kit-popup') in js. To get popup window element do @data('kit-popup').$el.
Method Default Description
beforeopen undefined

Set a function to call it before window opens. If it returns deferred.promise(), then popup window will not open till deferred.resolve(), and woun't open if deferred.reject(). You can just get data with $.ajax() for popup window.

$('.btn-modal123').popup beforeopen: -> d = $.Deferred() console.log @ # The button will be in the log # so you can add something like @addClass '_disabled_' # to disable button while getting data for popup window console.log @data 'kit-popup' # The instance of Modal class will in log # so to get popup window element you need to do @data('kit-popup').$el.addClass '_disabled_' # Do something here before open window # in this case it will open popup window after 2 seconds setTimeout -> d.resolve() , 2000 # End of your code d.promise()

onopen undefined

Set a function to call it after popup window opens.
beforeclose undefined

Call this function before popup window closes.
onclose undefined

Call this function after popup window closes.
